page.title: 09FARMING BILLINGSHURST
page.content: A RANDOM SURVEY OF THE FARMS IN OUR AREA HAS SHOWN THAT THE HIGHEST PERCENTAGE OF ANIMALS ARE DAIRY COWS. SOME FARMERS ALSO KEEP SHEEP,HORSES AND GOATS.INCLUDED IN OUR AREA IS A PIG FARM WITH 13O SOWS,4 BOARS,AND 5OO PIGLETS WHICH ARE BRED HERE BEFORE GOING ON TO A FATTENING UNIT.THE PIGS ARE FED ON MEAL ONLY,NO SWILL.THE SOWS ARE KEPT OUTSIDE DURING THE SUMMER,AND HOUSED IN THE WINTER.IN OUR AREA THERE IS ALSO A LARGE EGG FARM WITH 45,OOO LAYING HENS,15,OO0 PULLETS PRODUCING 16,568 DOZEN EGGS PER WEEK,WHCH ARE SUPPLIED DIRECTLY TO SHOPS.
